title: Add Contact page and display phone numbers

requirements.text: Create a new public Contact page route at "/contact" and render the tuition centre contact numbers "8754585354" and "9677219328" clearly on the page (including click-to-call "tel:" links).
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting "/contact" shows both phone numbers exactly as provided: 8754585354 and 9677219328
Each number is a clickable tel: link that opens the device dialer on supported devices
All user-facing text on the Contact page is in English

requirements.text: Update the site navigation so users can reach the new Contact page from the header navigation (currently includes a "Contact" item that scrolls to the "enquiry" section).
acceptanceCriteria: The header includes a working navigation path to the Contact page at "/contact"
Navigation works on both desktop and mobile header menus

requirements.text: Add the contact numbers "8754585354" and "9677219328" to the footer "Connect With Us" area so they are visible site-wide.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays both numbers exactly as provided
Footer layout remains visually consistent with existing styling

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui (immutable paths).
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Do not implement emailing of form submissions to aruns160896@gmail.com (email delivery is not supported/available in this environment).
Do not change the existing enquiry submission storage/admin listing behavior in the Motoko canister.
